verbose_text: Monosaccharides were detected as acetylated O-methylglycoside derivatives obtained by methanolysis (1.25 m HCl / MeOH, 85 degreesC, 24 h) followed by acetylation with acetic anhydride in pyridine (85 degreesC, 30 min).19 Linkage analysis was performed as previously described.20, 21 In brief, the sample was methylated with iodomethane and hydrolyzed with trifluoroacetic acid (2 m, 100 degreesC, 2 h).
